Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the main server's class

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Server()
    Class constructor It creates the server's socket

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addLobby​(java.lang.String lobbyName, ClientConnection clientConnection, java.lang.String playerName, int numPlayer, boolean simplePlay)
    This function creates a new lobby in the server It also adds the player to the playerInLobby map and lobbyConnections map
    void addLobbyEndGame​(EndGameServerMessage endGameServerMessage)
    This function adds the players who decided to play another game to a new lobby
    void deregisterConnection​(ClientConnection connection)
    This method removes and closes a client connection
    int getLobbiesCount()  
    java.lang.String getLobbiesNames()  
    void joinLobby​(int lobbyId, ClientConnection clientConnection, java.lang.String playerName)
    This function adds a new player to an existing lobby It also adds the player to the playerInLobby map and lobbyConnections map
    void run()
    This function opens the socket and submits new accepted connection to the runner

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server() throws java.io.IOException
      Class constructor It creates the server's socket
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the socket can't be created

  • Method Details

    • deregisterConnection

      public void deregisterConnection​(ClientConnection connection)
      This method removes and closes a client connection
      Parameters:
      connection - is the instance of the client's socket connection

    • getLobbiesCount

      public int getLobbiesCount()
      Returns:
      the number of active lobbies in the server

    • getLobbiesNames

      public java.lang.String getLobbiesNames() throws NoLobbyException
      Returns:
      a string containing the lobby's id, the name, the number of players in it and the game mode
      Throws:
      NoLobbyException - if there is no lobby available

    • addLobby

      public void addLobby​(java.lang.String lobbyName, ClientConnection clientConnection, java.lang.String playerName, int numPlayer, boolean simplePlay)
      This function creates a new lobby in the server It also adds the player to the playerInLobby map and lobbyConnections map
      Parameters:
      lobbyName - is the chosen lobby's name
      clientConnection - is he client's socket instance
      playerName - is the name of the player that created the lobby
      numPlayer - is the chosen number of player for the lobby
      simplePlay - is a flag representing that the game is without any god card

    • joinLobby

      public void joinLobby​(int lobbyId, ClientConnection clientConnection, java.lang.String playerName) throws FullLobbyException, InvalidLobbyException
      This function adds a new player to an existing lobby It also adds the player to the playerInLobby map and lobbyConnections map
      Parameters:
      lobbyId - is the lobby's id
      clientConnection - is the client's socket connection instance
      playerName - is the player's name
      Throws:
      FullLobbyException - if the selected lobby is already full
      InvalidLobbyException - if the selected lobby doesn't exist

    • addLobbyEndGame

      public void addLobbyEndGame​(EndGameServerMessage endGameServerMessage)
      This function adds the players who decided to play another game to a new lobby
      Parameters:
      endGameServerMessage - is the message that holds every information needed for the new game
      See Also:
      EndGameServerMessage

    • run

      public void run()
      This function opens the socket and submits new accepted connection to the runner
